inning1.commText: Karunaratne to Parvez Hossain Emon, no run, starts off with a shorter delivery as Parvez Hossain Emon defends it into the leg-side
Karunaratne to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, Parvez Hossain Emon opens his account with a boundary! Banged in short by the pacer and Parvez Hossain Emon pulls it over mid-wicket for four runs
Karunaratne to Parvez Hossain Emon, 2 runs, pitched up by the bowler outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon square drives it through backward point for a couple of runs
Karunaratne to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, on a length outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon crunches it towards cover-point where the fielder gets his hand to it, a single taken nevertheless
Karunaratne to Tanzid Hasan, no run, back of a length delivery outside off, punched firmly to cover by Tanzid Hasan
Karunaratne to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, short of a length delivery on leg, Tanzid Hasan pulls it to deep square leg for a single
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, 2 runs, back of a length delivery around middle and leg, Tanzid Hasan works it through square leg for a couple of runs

N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, B0$, lovely drive! Thushara pitches this up and the batsman has drilled it straight past the bowler. A couple of fielders try to stop it, but fail to do so. Results in a boundary eventually
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, no run, pitched up by the bowler around off, Tanzid Hasan drives it crisply to mid-off
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, no run, swings in sharply from a fullish length, Tanzid Hasan covers the line, drives it back to Thushara
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, no run, advances down the wicket and drives it towards mid-on, doesn't middle or time it that well
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, full and wide outside off, Tanzid Hasan drives it towards the fielder at cover. B0$
Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, short and wide outside off, Tanzid Hasan advances down the wicket and slashes it hard to cover-point
Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, no run, banged in short by Binura Fernando, 126 clicks, Parvez Hossain Emon goes for a pull and misses

Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, B1$ On the shorter side, Parvez Hossain Emon stands tall and smokes it over deep mid-wicket for half-a-dozen. Was a slower delivery and Parvez Hossain Emon made sure to smoke it into the stands
Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, short and wide outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon slashes away from his body, connects thin air
Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, Binura Fernando goes full outside off and Parvez Hossain Emon square drives it through backward point for one
Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, no run, short of a length outside off, Tanzid Hasan has a swing and a miss
Binura Fernando to Tanzid Hasan, no run, 128kph, tad short as Tanzid Hasan pulls it to mid-on on a couple of bounces, failed to time that
Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, a low full toss by Theekshana and the batsman has drilled it straight past the bowler to greet him with a boundary
Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, drifting on the pads, Parvez Hossain Emon clips it to short fine leg and takes a quick run

Theekshana to Tanzid Hasan, no run, a carrom ball around middle, Tanzid Hasan looks to nudge it away, gets an inside edge on to the pads. Had it not nicked the inside edge, would have been a candidate for an lbw dismissal
Theekshana to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, touch short on middle and leg, worked through the leg-side for a single

Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, Parvez Hossain Emon is off to a flying start! He goes down on his knee and sweeps it away to the deep backward square leg for four runs. Has a strike rate of more than 200 at the moment

Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, back-to-back boundaries. Theekshana goes full outside off and the batsman has drilled it through covers for a boundary to end the over. An expensive over by Theekshana, concedes 14 runs in it
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, back of a length delivery and Tanzid Hasan has knocked it towards long-on for a single with soft hands
N Thushara to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, pitched up around off, squeezed into the off-side for a single

N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, 1 run, banged in short by Thushara, Tanzid Hasan shimmies down the wicket and pulls it towards deep square leg for a single, was in the air, but landed well short of the fielder charging in from the deep
N Thushara to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, low full toss, swinging into the batsman who squeezes it towards long-on for a single
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, B0$, flicked away! Thushara goes full and the batsman has flicked this away to the deep mid-wicket boundary. This almost went the distance
N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, B0$ Caught!!

N Thushara to Tanzid Hasan, B0$ Caught by Theekshana!! Thushara breaks the opening partnership. A low full toss on middle and leg, Tanzid Hasan flicks it uppishly but straight to the fielder at mid-wicket. Taken comfortably by Theekshana and Tanzid Hasan walks back to the pavilion after playing a handy knock. Could have played at a better strike rate probably. B1$

Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$, B1$ Pitched up by the bowler outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon lunges forward and chips it over covers for a rollicking boundary. He's smashing all the Sri Lankan bowlers, making the most of these pristine batting conditions

Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, banged in short outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon cuts it towards short third man where the fielder stops it with his left hand. Thushara the fielder on that occasion
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, no run, back of a length delivery around off, knocked back to the bowler by Litton Das
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, slower back of a length delivery outside off, Litton Das steers it to square third man for one
Binura Fernando to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, back of a length delivery around middle and leg, Parvez Hossain Emon drags it towards square leg for a single
Binura Fernando to Litton Das, 1 run, back of a length delivery outside off, punched to cover-point for a single by Litton Das. B0$
Shanaka to Litton Das, 1 run, knocks this towards mid-off and takes a quick single does the Bangladesh captain. The fielder fires in a throw at the bowler's end, misses
Shanaka to Parvez Hossain Emon, no run, slower delivery outside off on back of a length as Parvez Hossain Emon knocks it in front of cover
Shanaka to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, loses his shape completely. This was pitched up by the bowler outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon swings hard and the outside edge flies over point for one
Shanaka to Litton Das, no run, back of a length delivery around off, shapes back in as Litton Das knocks it down the pitch
Shanaka to Litton Das, no run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, Litton Das advances down the wicket, goes for a flashy drive, gets beaten as he plays down the wrong line. Almost nicked it off

Shanaka to Litton Das, leg byes, 1 run, excellent over by Shanaka. Short of a length delivery on leg, Litton Das looks to nudge it away, it clips his thigh pad and rolls towards short fine leg, a leg bye taken
Vandersay to Litton Das, 1 run, starts off with a slightly short ball as Litton Das works it through the leg-side for a single
Vandersay to Parvez Hossain Emon, no run, googly outside off, Parvez Hossain Emon goes for a sweep and misses
Vandersay to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, punched through the off-side by Parvez Hossain Emon for a single

Vandersay to Litton Das, byes, B0$, that's a lovely delivery, was a googly and the batsman couldn't read it at all. Gets beaten as the ball sails over the stumps, beats the keeper and races away to the boundary
Vandersay to Litton Das, 2 runs, Vandersay goes short as Litton Das drags this through the leg-side for a couple of runs
Vandersay to Litton Das, B0$ Lbw!!

Vandersay to Litton Das, B0$ Lbw!! Vandersay has struck in his first over. Removes the Bangladesh captain. Was a straighter delivery around off, Litton Das goes down on his knee and attempts a sweep. Beaten and rapped on the pads. No bat involved, the impact is umpire's call and it's crashing into the off-stump. Bangladesh will retain the review as the impact was umpire's call. A rusty knock by Litton comes to an end.. B1$
Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, 1 run, carrom ball on middle and leg, worked through backward square leg by Parvez Hossain Emon

Theekshana to Naim, no run, slightly full ball as Naim drives it back to the bowler, doesn't middle it though. Theekshana was quick to fire a throw at the keeper's end as Naim was momentarily out of his crease
Theekshana to Naim, 1 run, worked through the on-side by Naim for a single
Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$ Caught!!

Theekshana to Parvez Hossain Emon, B0$ Caught by Shanaka!! Theekshana gets rid of the set batsman. A tossed up delivery around off, Parvez Hossain Emon looks to take him on. Loses his shape while going for the aerial route and the fielder at long-off takes a well-judged catch. Was a skier, went miles up in the air, so it was a good take by Shanaka in the deep. Bangladesh losing their way after a productive powerplay. B1$
Theekshana to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, flatter delivery around off, Towhid Hridoy nudges it towards the on-side for one
Theekshana to Naim, 1 run, flatter delivery on middle and leg, Naim knocks it down the ground to long-on for a single
Vandersay to Naim, 1 run, that was a low full toss on middle and leg, Naim sweeps it through backward square leg for a single
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, tad short outside off, Towhid Hridoy carves it through backward point for one
Vandersay to Naim, 1 run, pitched up by the bowler outside off, Naim reverse sweeps it to short third man for one
Vandersay to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, googly on the shorter side, Towhid Hridoy rocks back in the crease and cuts it through backward point for one

Vandersay to Naim, B0$, B1$ A tossed up delivery on leg, right in the slot to play this shot. Naim goes down on his knee and slogsweeps it over deep square leg for half-a-dozen. Clean strike by the middle-order batsman
Vandersay to Naim, no run, googly to end the over, Naim opens the bat face, steering it towards backward point

Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, no run, length delivery outside off, skids along the deck and keeps slightly low, Towhid Hridoy attempts a cut and gets beaten due to the lack of bounce. B0$ Wasn't a confident appeal by SL

Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, no run, short of a length delivery outside off, Towhid Hridoy goes for a late-cut, gets beaten on the outside edge. Shanaka has been quite economical so far. Batters have struggled to score runs against him today
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, 2 runs, banged in short by Shanaka, Towhid Hridoy drags it towards wide long-on for a couple of runs
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, no run, pitched up by the bowler around off, 125 clicks, Towhid Hridoy swings hard, gets an inside edge on to the pads. His timing was pretty late, hence couldn't middle it
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, 127kph, slightly short in length, Towhid Hridoy knocks it to long-on for a single

Shanaka to Naim, no run, another fantastic over by Shanaka. Concedes two runs in his first over, goes for three in this over. He walks across in the crease and looks to scoop it, doesn't connect it though, struck on the pads
Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, short and slow outside off, Towhid Hridoy slices it towards short third man for one
Binura Fernando to Naim, 1 run, way too short on leg, a wayward delivery as Naim drags it through backward square leg
Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, pitched up by the bowler, right into the slot, Towhid Hridoy drills it powerfully to long-on
Binura Fernando to Naim, 1 run, makes room and carves the back of a length delivery to square third man for a single
Binura Fernando to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, short and slow outside off, Towhid Hridoy opens the bat face, steering this to square third man for a single
Binura Fernando to Naim, no run, a slower bouncer to end the over, Naim lets it through to the keeper
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, 1 run, Shanaka goes short and Towhid Hridoy has pulled it through mid-wicket for a single
Shanaka to Naim, 1 run, width on offer as Naim slashes it through cover-point for a single
Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, B0$ Caught!!

Shanaka to Towhid Hridoy, B0$ Caught by Kusal Mendis!! Edged and taken! Shanaka strikes and Towhid Hridoy's struggle comes to an end. Was a short of a length delivery outside off, Towhid Hridoy attempts a cut and the thick outside edge has been taken cleanly by Mendis behind the wickets. Shanaka has been excellent today. Bowled a couple of economical overs, built pressure and has taken a wicket to follow all that good work. Bangladesh in a spot of bother with runs difficult to come by. The boundaries have dried up. B1$
Shanaka to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, banged in short by Shanaka and the batsman has pulled it through the leg-side for a single
Shanaka to Naim, 2 runs, a short ball by Shanaka and Naim drags it towards wide long-on for a couple of runs
Shanaka to Naim, 1 run, a successful over by Shanaka. Ends it with a full length delivery that has been squeezed into the off-side for one
B0$ Is this pitching in line?
Vandersay to Naim, no run, nope, it's not. B0$ Was a googly as Naim got rapped on the pads as he failed to read the wrong 'un. A successful and good review by Naim
Vandersay to Naim, 1 run, slogged towards long-on by moving across the line, a single taken
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run, nudged back to the bowler by Mehidy Hasan Miraz, doesn't middle it
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, way too short and the batsman has pulled this to deep mid-wicket for one
Vandersay to Naim, 1 run, on the fuller side on middle, Naim swings early and gets it off the cue end towards short third
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, full toss to end the over, Mehidy Hasan Miraz sweeps it towards deep backward square leg
Shanaka to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, driven to deep mid-on by Mehidy Hasan Miraz for a single
Shanaka to Naim, 1 run, on the shorter side, Naim pulls it powerfully to deep mid-wicket, finds the fielder stationed near the boundary
Shanaka to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run, walks across in the crease to play but Shanaka goes short, Mehidy Hasan Miraz tries to play the ramp shot, doesn't connect though

Shanaka to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$, B1$ Banged in short on middle and leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz goes for a pull and the top-edge flies over the keeper down the leg-side. Much needed boundary for Bangladesh

Shanaka to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$, short and punished! Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets into a good position, goes deep back in the crease and pulls it away to the deep square leg boundary where he manages to beat the fielder
Shanaka to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, back of a length delivery around middle and leg, keeps a touch low, Mehidy Hasan Miraz knocks it to long-on for one
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run, slightly short outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz steers it to short third man
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs, floated on middle and leg, Mehidy Hasan Miraz sweeps it through backward square leg for a couple of runs
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, slogswept through mid-wicket for a single by Mehidy Hasan Miraz

Vandersay to Naim, byes, 1 run, B0$ Was a googly outside off, Naim was down the wicket to play this, swings hard and gets an outside edge. The ball flicks Mendis' gloves and lobs towards short third man. Was a tough chance, but it will go down as a dropped catch. B1$
Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run, full and straight outside off, skids along the deck, Mehidy Hasan Miraz gets beaten

Vandersay to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$, full in length, into the slot and Mehidy Hasan Miraz slogsweeps it past the fielder at deep mid-wicket. Mehidy Hasan Miraz playing a handy knock, dealing in boundaries at the moment
Theekshana to Naim, 1 run, floated on off, driven to long-off for a single by Naim

Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs, on the pads as Mehidy Hasan Miraz works it through mid-wicket for a couple of runs. A direct-hit at the bowler's end, but the batsman was well inside the crease
Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, full and straight at the stumps, knocked to long-on for a single by Mehidy Hasan Miraz
Theekshana to Naim, 1 run, short and wide outside off, Naim slices it through the off-side for a single
Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run, full length delivery on off, keeps straight as Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives it to cover
Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, Mehidy Hasan Miraz drives the floated delivery to wide long-off for a single to end the over
N Thushara to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, leg byes, 1 run, yorker length delivery outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to play the scoop and gets hit on the pads. A leg bye taken in the end
N Thushara to Naim, B0$, juicy full toss by Thushara at the stumps, Naim goes down on his knee and scoops this towards the fine leg boundary. Well executed shot by the southpaw
N Thushara to Naim, leg byes, 1 run, B0$ Was a yorker that beat the batsman and struck him on the pads, pitching down the leg-side and missing the leg stump comfortably, a leg bye taken

N Thushara to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run, short and wide outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz attempts a cut and misses. Was a slower delivery that Mehidy Hasan Miraz couldn't connect. Wasn't called a wide because the batsman had moved across in the crease
N Thushara to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run, yorker length ball around off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz squeezes it onto his pads and takes a single
N Thushara to Naim, 1 run, another ecnomical over. A full toss to end the over as Naim chips it to long-off for a single
Theekshana to Naim, 1 run, heaved across the line, mistimes it towards long-on for one

Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$, Bangladesh need more of such boundaries. This was a full toss outside off, slightly wide, Mehidy Hasan Miraz reaches out for it and slashes it over backward point for four runs
Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$ Caught!!

Theekshana to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, B0$ Caught by Asalanka!! Theekshana has the last laugh! A tossed up delivery outside off, Mehidy Hasan Miraz looks to go big, throws his hands at it and slices it towards cover. An easy catch for Asalanka and the set batsman is gone. Theekshana is happy as he celebrates in style pointing his finger towards the sky. B1$
Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, mistimed past the keeper for a single
Theekshana to Naim, 1 run, yorker length ball outside off, squeezed towards the off-side for a single
Theekshana to Shamim Hossain, B0$, wow! That's a fantastic shot by Shamim Hossain. Goes down on his knee and reverse swipes this over third man for half-a-dozen. Such a fine shot that was
N Thushara to Naim, 2 runs, full and wide outside off, Naim squeezes it through backward point for a couple of runs
N Thushara to Naim, 1 run, yorker length delivery outside off, Naim squeezes it towards cover for a single

N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, no run, slower bouncer outside off, Shamim Hossain premeditates, looks to play the reverse scoop, but misses it altogether. The non-striker was out of his crease, but the throw wasn't a great one by the keeper
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, B0$, B1$ Banged in short by Thushara and the batsman has pulled it over fine leg for half-a-dozen. Shamim Hossain playing a cameo to finish things off
N Thushara to Shamim Hossain, 1 run, juicy full toss outside off, Shamim Hossain slashes it over covers for a single
N Thushara to Naim, 1 run, B0$ A yorker length delivery outside off, Naim digs it out into the off-side and takes a single to end the innings

B0$ That's a formidable total posted by Bangladesh, but they should have scored more runs given the start Parven Hossain Emon gave them. Bangladesh had a really productive powerplay as they scored 54 runs for the loss of one wicket. Just when things were going smoothly for the visitors, Sri Lanka struck back with a couple of wickets in quick succession. Litton Das was trapped lbw by Vandersay, while Theekshana removed the set batsman - Emon soonafter. Shanaka was introduced into the attack in the middle overs and he didn't allow the Bangladesh batters to rotate the strike and stemmed the flow of runs. Naim and Miraz chipped in with a much-needed partnership for the the 5th wicket and the cameo by Shamim Hossain helped Bangladesh breach the 150-run mark. The Sri Lankan bowlers bowled some good slower deliveries in the second half and as a result of that they were able to restrict the opposition batters. Will Sri Lanka chase this total down and take a lead in the series? Join us back in 10 minutes for the second essay to find out..
We're back for the chase.. Sri Lanka have done well to restrict the visitors to 154 - an easy chase coming up? A slip in place for Saifuddin

inning2.commText: Saifuddin to Nissanka, B0$, B1$, back of a length and just outside off - Nissanka leans across, presents a straight bat on the back-foot punch and places it wide of cover-point for a boundary

Saifuddin to Nissanka, B0$, back-to-back boundaries for Nissanka - short and at the body, Nissanka swivels across, picks the length early and then pulls it backward of square on the on-side for a boundary

Saifuddin to Nissanka, B0$, make that three in a row now - on a length and well wide of off, Nissanka saw the width and lashed it over backward point, was in the air and well wide of the fielder in the ring
Saifuddin to Nissanka, no run, much better from Saifuddin, a floaty slower ball on off - Nissanka spots it early and defends it back at the bowler
Saifuddin to Nissanka, 1 run, on a good length and just outside off - an open-faced push by Nissanka, behind square on the off-side for a single
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, back of a length and at the stumps - Kusal Mendis swivels across on the pull, was in the air and bounced in front of the man at deep square leg, B0$

Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, the boundaries continue to flow, short of a good length and well wide of off - Mendis gets on top of the bounce and then caresses it square past point, used Taskin's pace and found the ropes
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, no run, fuller length delivery on off, Mendis leans forward and gets a thick inside edge on the drive
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, short of a good length and well wide of off, driven to the left of mid-off, there's a fumble by the fielder and that allows a second run
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, that's too easy for Mendis - full and down leg, he gets inside the line and then flicks it fine, past the keeper and runs away to the ropes
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, no run, a floaty half-volley outside off, driven back at the bowler
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, B1$, fraction short from Taskin and Mendis is all over the pull like a rash, swivels across and then muscles it high and deep into the stands at backward square leg
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Nissanka, leg byes, 1 run, short and into the body, Nissanka is early into the pull and misses, off the thigh-pad and lobbed behind square on the on-side for a leg-bye
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, on a good length and just outside off, driven to the right of cover - the fielder gets a hand onto it and keeps them down to a single
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Nissanka, no run, short of a length and angling into the right-hander, Nissanka looks to swing it onto the on-side and missed
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Nissanka, B0$, B1$, a length ball around off, right in the slot and Nissanka clobbers it high over mid-wicket - got his left leg out of the way and struck it with sheer power
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Nissanka, B0$, B1$, short of a good length and just outside off - Nissanka is late on the front-foot pull, gets a thick inside edge and the ball races away past the leg-stump
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Nissanka, B0$, B1$, too full and too wide from Tanzim - Nissanka presses forward and drills the drive wide of extra-cover, no one moved - another expensive over, B2$
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, Bangladesh continue to bleed, low full-toss from Taskin - Mendis gets under it and then shovels it high and wide of mid-wicket, went sailing into the stands

Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, boundaries galore at the moment - short of a good length and well wide of off - Mendis leans across, plays with an open face and cuts it behind point for another boundary

Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, B1$, Mendis is on a mission - was the slower ball and he's picked the length early, bends down low and then swipes it high over backward square leg for a 86m hit - the holiday crowd getting its money worth already
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, yorker length delivery on off, squeezed in front of mid-on for a quick single
Taskin Ahmed to Nissanka, no run, short of a good length and just outside off - Nissanka waits and then dabs it to short third
Taskin Ahmed to Nissanka, 1 run, fuller length delivery on the pads, driven down to long-on for a single - B0$

Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, B0$, spin or pace, nothing's working for Bangladesh at the moment - a poor first ball from Mehidy, short and down leg, Nissanka swivels across and pulls it over backward square leg for a maximum
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, 2 runs, flighted delivery on middle and leg, clipped into the gap wide of mid-wicket and they scamper back for the second

Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, B0$, B1$, they're in a real hurry here - Nissanka comes down the pitch, gets close to the ball and then swings it back over the bowler's head, sailed over the ropes for another maximum
Mehidy switches to round the wicket
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, B0$ Caught!!

Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nissanka, B0$ Caught by Rishad Hossain!! .. And he's got his man now - tossed up and sliding across the right-hander, Nissanka was shaping to lift it back over the bowler's head, gets it right off the bottom of the bat, plenty of height and no real distance - Rishad gets under it at mid-on and completes the catch. Relief for Bangladesh as the scintillating stand comes to an end. B1$
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, no run, tossed up just outside off, Perera defends it back at the bowler
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, no run, flighted delivery on off, Perera gets well forward as he defended
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, short of a good length and just outside off - Kusal Mendis swivels across and pulls it to the right of long-on for a run
Saifuddin to Kusal Perera, no run, short of a length and angling across the left-hander - Mendis looks to hack it onto the on-side and mistimes it to mid-on

Saifuddin to Kusal Perera, 1 run, on a good length and just outside off - Perera looks to drive and skews an inside edge past the leg-stump - Kusal Mendis calls him through and it would have been a close call had the keeper found the stumps
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, fuller length delivery on the pads, whipped into the gap past square leg for a single
Saifuddin to Kusal Perera, 1 run, low full-toss on the pads, Perera clips it uppishly and it almost carried all the way to deep mid-wicket
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, on a length and at the pads, flicked into the gap past square leg for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, dropped short and sliding across the right-hander - Mendis backs away, waits on the ball and then steers it behind point for a couple
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, tossed up on middle and leg, nudged into the gap wide of md-wicket
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, 1 run, dropped short and wide of off - punched square on the off-side for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, no run, tossed up on the leg-stump line, Mendis leans across into the defensive push
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, dragged short by Mehidy - Mendis rocks back on the pull to deep mid-wicket
Shamim Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, a long hop from Shamim - dragged it short and down leg, pulled behind square on the on-side - Rishad fumbles, but recovers quickly to prevent the second run
Shamim Hossain to Kusal Perera, no run, flighted delivery outside off, dabbed off the back-foot to point
Shamim Hossain to Kusal Perera, B0$, B1$, tossed up just outside off - Perera gets down low, reverses the stance and then sweeps it over backward point, the ball sailing over the ropes for a maximum
Shamim Hossain to Kusal Perera, 1 run, pushed through on middle, nudged wide of mid-wicket for a single
Shamim Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, tossed up on middle and leg, tucked into the gap wide of mid-wicket for a couple
Shamim Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, flatter and at the stumps, pulled through mid-wicket for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, flighted on the leg-stump line, worked through mid-wicket for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, no run, Mehidy tosses one around off, nudged into the gap wide of point for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, no run, flighted delivery outside off - steered with an open face to backward point
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, no run, the slider from Mehidy, comes back into the left-hander and it's punched straight to the fielder at cover-point
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, no run, Mehidy tosses one around of - Perera leans across and plays an open-faced push to backward point
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, 1 run, the slider from Mehidy, kept coming back into the left-hander and catches the inside edge on Perera's push, skews behind square on the on-side for a single
A slip for Rishad
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, B0$, B1$, tossed up and drifting around off, Perera backs away, opens the face of the bat and then uses the pace on the ball to steer past slip
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, no run, flighted delivery on off, Perera stays back and blocks it back at the bowler

Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, B0$, that's some nonchalant stuff from Perera - he knew that there was no one behind square on the on-side, spots the leg-break, shuffles across and then laps it past short fine
The slip has been removed
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, 1 run, dropped short and wide of off, cut away square on the off-side for a single
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, no run, the leg-break from Rishad, Mendis backs away and then runs it to backward point
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, dropped short and down leg, pulled behind square on the on-side for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, no run, flighted delivery on off, Mendis makes room and slaps it straight to the fielder at cover
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, no run, tossed up on off, Mendis leans across and picks out mid-wicket with the on-drive
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, no run, Mehidy tosses one on the leg-stump line, turned to the on-side
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, very full and at the pads, flicked past square leg for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Perera, 1 run, dragegd short by Mehidy - pulled away to deep mid-wicket for a single
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, dropped slower and shorter of off, sliced away behind square on the off-side for a single, brings up a B0$
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, no run, slower short ball wide of off, Mendis reaches out and slaps it straight to the fielder at cover
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, no run, on a good length and angling into the right-hander, bowled with a scrambled seam and Mendis is struck high on the back-thigh
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, low full-toss outside off, driven straight to the fielder at mid-off for a single
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Perera, 1 run, banged in short and at the left-hander, pulled down to long leg for a single
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, back of a length and well wide of off, Mendis runs it down towards third man for a single
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Perera, 1 run, short of a good length and just outside off - Kusal Perera pokes forward and gets an inside edge onto the back-thigh, rolls wide of the keeper for a run
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, 1 run, tossed up well outside off, swiped away to deep mid-wicket for a single
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, fraction short and just outside off, pulled through mid-wicket for a single
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, no run, tossed up and sliding across the left-hander - Perera shapes for the reverse sweep and misses
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, no run, flighted delivery outside off, defended back at the bowler
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, B0$ Caught!!

Rishad Hossain to Kusal Perera, B0$ Caught by Litton Das!! A top-edge on the wrong 'un, Litton Das calls for the catch, runs towards square leg and completes it with ease. It's the extra bounce that's Perera's undoing, was looking to sweep against the turn, doesn't get on top of the bounce and the top-edge was found. B1$
Rishad Hossain to Avishka Fernando, no run, tossed up well wide of off, Avishka reaches out on the drive and mistimes it to cover
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, fuller length delivery outside off, driven into the gap wide of cover and Mendis is back for the second
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, banged in short and well wide of off - Mendis gets on top of the bounce and pulls it down to mid-wicket
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Avishka Fernando, no run, on a good length and just outside off, pushed back at the bowler
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Avishka Fernando, no run, short of a length and angling into the right-hander, tucked off the back-foot to mid-wicket
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, back of a length and well wide of off, Avishka steers it with the angle to third man, on the bounce to the fielder

Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, nicely played, overpitched by Sakib - Mendis leans forward and drives it back past the diving mid-off fielder - long-on sprints to his left and keeps them down to a couple
Rishad Hossain to Avishka Fernando, no run, tossed up just outside off, driven back at the bowler
Rishad Hossain to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, a floaty delivery wide of off, driven down to long-off for a single
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, tossed up on off, a push-drive down to long-off for a single
Rishad Hossain to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, dropped short and just outside off, clipped through mid-wicket for a single
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, no run, tad too short and wide of off, steered straight to the fielder at backward point
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, no run, a leading edge, but the ball drops short of cover - Mendis was looking to work it onto the on-side, but the ball held its line and found a thick front-edge
Taskin Ahmed to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, length ball on the pads, clipped to the right of mid-wicket for a quick single

Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, B0$, that's easy pickings for Kusal Mendis - slower short ball, but it's down leg and he's muscled it over long leg, the fielder was inside the ring and he can only watch it go, on the bounce and over the ropes
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, no run, a floaty half-volley outside off, drilled to the left of mid-off who makes a diving save
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, back of a length and well wide of off, Mendis runs it down to thirtd man, just a single
Taskin Ahmed to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, on a good length and angling into the pads, clipped behind square on the on-side for a single
Taskin Ahmed to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, fuller length delivery outside off, driven to the left of mid-off, the fielder lets the ball slip through his grasp and they're back for the second
Rishad Hossain to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, flighted delivery outside off, punched into the gap wide of cover for a single
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 1 run, Rishad tosses one well outside off, pushed down to long-off for a single
Rishad Hossain to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, dropped short and wide of off, punched square on the off-side for a single

Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, B0$, flatter and quicker of off - Mendis waits on it, opens the face of the bat and then uses Rishad's pace to run it wide of short third, they're coasting towards victory here
Rishad, from round the wicket
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, 2 runs, a wide full-toss and Mendis drags the swipe to the right of long-on, comes back for the second
Rishad Hossain to Kusal Mendis, no run, flatter and sliding across the right-hander - Mendis looks to dab and misses
Saifuddin to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, short and at the stumps, pulled down to long leg for a single
Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, B0$ Caught!!

Saifuddin to Kusal Mendis, B0$ Caught by Shamim Hossain!! A leading edge and it's a one-handed stunner at cover, might've come too late in the piece, but Bangladesh have something to cheer. On a good length and angling into the right-hander - Mendis was shaping for the flick and closed the face of the bat, the leading edge popped up to the left of cover - Shamim sprinted across, leapt across and then plucked it with his left hand. B1$
Saifuddin to Asalanka, 1 run, short of a good length and well wide of off, cut square on the off-side for a single
Saifuddin to Avishka Fernando, no run, on a good length and just outside off, defended back at the bowler
Saifuddin to Avishka Fernando, no run, fuller length delivery on the pads, clipped straight to the fielder at mid-wicket

Saifuddin to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, full and just outside off, driven to mid-off and Avishka sets off for a quick single - there's a shy at the bowler's end and he needed to put in a full-stretched dive to get home
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, fuller length delivery on off, driven down to long-on for a single
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Asalanka, no run, banged in short and at the stumps - Asalanka ducks under and lets it go
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Asalanka, no run, on a length and angling across the left-hander - Asalanka swings across the line and misses
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Asalanka, 1 run, low full-toss on the pads, Asalanka squeezes an under-edge onto the pad and the ball rolls in front of mid-wicket
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Avishka Fernando, 1 run, full-toss from Sakib, driven down to long-on for a single
Tanzim Hasan Sakib to Asalanka, B0$, B1$, length ball and Asalanka gets under it on the lofted drive, strikes it cleanly and sends it sailing over long-on for a maxmimum - B2$

B0$ A comfortable chase with the openers breaking the back of this chase within the first 4 overs. Theycame out smashing the ball all over the park andadded 78 for the opening wicket inside the first 5 overs. Nissanka smashed a 16-ball 42 and was well supported by Kusal Mendis as theyran amok. The visitors looked helpless and clueless as the ball flewtowards all directions of the ground - Mehidy did give them some respite by dismissing Nissanka and things did slow down. Mendis completed a 31-ball half-century and eventually finished with a 51-ball 73 as the hosts coasted to a 6-wicket win. The bowlers had done their job by restricting the visitors to a mere 154 and frankly it wasn't enough on this pitch. Stay tuned for the presentations.

B0$ - Yes, I got back-to-back hundred and fifty. Thanks to Pathum, I could manage my innings. The wicketwas slow and turning, we had plenty of balls left, that's whyI slowed down my game. Played my natural game earlier, KJP (Kusal Perera) played well and I wanted to stay till the end.He then thanks the crowd for supporting the team (in Sinhalese)

B0$ - I don't think the toss was crucial, but we didn't get many runs. A couple of balls stayed low and it did so in the second half as well. It's not just today's game, last 7-8 matches, I think the batters who're in have to take responsibilty. 170 would have been a good score with our bowlers, they weren't good, Taskin is our lead bowler and anyone can have a bad day. Rishad has been improving a lot for us.

B0$ - I think when we played in the LPL, chasing teams won because of fast outfield and a shorter boundary, that's why we decided to chase. Jeffrey Vandersay has been with us for a number of years, he didn't get chances with Wanindu in the team, but that's a good headache to have. Not a lot of improvements in this game, we were good in all compartments of the game, we probably can field better. The pitch does get slower as the ball gets old (on taking their time to finish)
Sri Lanka now have a chance to complete another series win as the two teams move to Dambulla for the second game on the 13th. Do join us for all the action. For now, cheers and bye..
